raw_comment:
By looking at the graph, it is clear that these schools care greatly about legacy. 

I wonder how this data was found because this does not seem like something that schools would want to admit, or willingly give out.

This does not relate to me much, because not only am I, not legacy, nor do I plan on attending an Ivy League, but I plan on studying outside of the United States, and this graph does not include any information on that.
ace_sentences: It is clear that these schools care greatly about legacy.
I wonder how this data was found.
This data does not seem like something that schools want to admit.
This data does not seem like something that schools willingly give out.
This does not relate to me much.
I am not a legacy student.
I do not plan to attend an Ivy League school.
I plan to study outside of the United States.
The graph does not include any information about studying outside of the United States.
